integer.name: maxActive
integer.caption: Max active
integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can be borrowed from the pool at one time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be active at one time. When maxActive is exceeded, the pool is said to be exhausted.

integer.name: maxIdle
integer.caption: Max idle
integer.description: Controls the maximum number of connections that can sit idle in the pool at any time. When set to a negative value, there is no limit to the number of connections that may be idle at one time.

enum.name: initialisationPolicy
enum.caption: Initialisation policy
enum.description: Determines how connections in a pool should be initialized. The possible values are: INITIALISE_NONE (will not load any connection into the pool on startup), INITIALISE_ONE (will load one initial connection into the pool on startup), or INITIALISE_ALL (will load all connections in the pool on startup)

enum.name: exhaustedAction
enum.caption: Exhausted action
enum.description: Specifies the behavior of the connection pool when the pool is exhausted. Possible values are: "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_FAIL", which will throw a NoSuchElementException, "WHEN_EXHAUSTED_WAIT", which will block by invoking Object.wait(long) until a new or idle object is available, or WHEN_EXHAUSTED_GROW, which will create a new connection and return it, essentially making maxActive meaningless. If a positive maxWait value is supplied, it will block for at most that many milliseconds, after which a NoSuchElementException will be thrown. If maxThreadWait is a negative value, it will block indefinitely.

integer.name: maxWait
integer.caption: Max wait
integer.description: When exhausted action is Wait (or block) this is the amount of time in milliseconds that the pool will wait before failing. Setting a negative value will block indefinitely until an idle instance becomes available.

integer.name: minEvictionMillis
integer.caption: Min eviction (ms)
integer.description: Determines the minimum amount of time a connection may sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction. When non-positive, no connections will be evicted from the pool due to idle time alone.

integer.name: evictionCheckIntervalMillis
integer.caption: Eviction check interval (ms)
integer.description: Specifies the number of milliseconds between runs of the connection evictor. When non-positive, no connection evictor is executed.

label.name: connectionLabel
label.caption: Define how mule should attempt to handle a connection failure

radioBoolean.name: noReconnection
radioBoolean.caption: Do not use a Reconnection strategy

radioBoolean.name: standardReconnection
radioBoolean.caption: Standard Reconnection
radioBoolean.description: A reconnection strategy that allows the user to configure how many times a reconnection should be attempted and how long to wait between attempts.

integer.name: reconnectionAttemps
integer.caption: Reconnection Attempts
integer.description: How many reconnection attempts to make

boolean.name: reconnectForever
boolean.caption: Reconnect Forever
boolean.description: A reconnection strategy that retries an infinite number of times at the specified frequency.

classname.name: class
classname.caption: Class
classname.description: A class that implements the RetryPolicyTemplate interface.

name.name: name
name.caption: Name
name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.

string.name: account
string.caption: Account
string.description: Registered Avalara account.

string.name: avalaraClient
string.caption: Avalara Client
string.description: Target client to which make the call.

password.name: license
password.caption: License
password.description: The matching license for the account.

string.name: taxServiceEndpoint
string.caption: Tax Service Endpoint
string.description: Tax Webservice endpoint.

string.name: addressServiceEndpoint
string.caption: Address Service Endpoint
string.description: Address Webservice endpoint.

string.name: batchServiceEndpoint
string.caption: Batch Service Endpoint
string.description: Batch Webservice endpoint.

globalRef.name: config-ref
globalRef.caption: Connector Configuration
globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.

cloud-connector.caption: Avalara
cloud-connector.description: Avalara provides automated sales tax solutions to streamline cumbersome, error-prone tax compliance processes and reduce the risk of loss or penalty in case of an audit. Their automated solutions automatically perform address validation, jurisdiction research and rate calculation and allow you to manage even the most complicated tax issues, such as situs, nexus, tax tiers, tax holidays, exemptions, certificate management and product taxability rules.

integer.name: adjustmentReason
integer.caption: Adjustment Reason
integer.description: The reason for this tax adjustment.

string.name: adjustmentDescription
string.caption: Adjustment Description
string.description: A description of a tax adjustment.

string.name: batchCode
string.caption: Batch Code
string.description: The batchCode value.

string.name: companyCode
string.caption: Company Code
string.description: Client application company reference code.

string.name: currencyCode
string.caption: Currency Code
string.description: It is 3 character ISO 4217 currency code.

string.name: customerCode
string.caption: Customer Code
string.description: Client application customer reference code.

string.name: customerUsageType
string.caption: Customer Usage Type
string.description: Client application customer or usage type. CustomerUsageType determines the exempt status of the transaction based on the exemption tax rules for the jurisdictions involved. CustomerUsageType may also be set at the line item level. The standard values for the CustomerUsageType (A-L). A Federal Government B State/Local Govt. C Tribal Government D Foreign Diplomat E Charitable Organization F Religious/Education G Resale H Agricultural Production I Industrial Prod/Mfg. J Direct Pay Permit K Direct Mail L - Other.

string.name: docCode
string.caption: Doc Code
string.description: The internal reference code used by the client application.

string.name: docDate-ref
string.caption: Doc Date Reference
string.description: Date of invoice, purchase order, etc.

string.name: destinationCode
string.caption: Destination Code
string.description: Code that refers one of the address of the baseAddress collection. It has to be the same code of one of the address's addressCode. It represents the destination address.

string.name: discount
string.caption: Discount
string.description: The discount amount to apply to the document. The string represents a .

string.name: exchangeRate
string.caption: Exchange Rate
string.description: The exchange rate value. The string represents a.

string.name: exemptionNo
string.caption: Exemption No
string.description: Exemption number used for this transaction.

string.name: locationCode
string.caption: Location Code
string.description: Location Code value. It is Also referred to as a Store Location, Outlet Id, or Outlet code is a number assigned by the State which identifies a Store location. Some state returns require taxes are broken out separately for Store Locations.

string.name: originCode
string.caption: Origin Code
string.description: Code that refers one of the address of the baseAddress collection. It has to be the same code of one of the address's addressCode. It represents the origin address.

string.name: purchaseOrderNo
string.caption: Purchase Order No
string.description: Purchase order identifier. PurchaseOrderNo is required for single use exemption certificates to match the order and invoice with the certificate.

string.name: referenceCode
string.caption: Reference Code
string.description: For returns (see ), refers to the of the original invoice.

string.name: salespersonCode
string.caption: Salesperson Code
string.description: The client application salesperson reference code.

string.name: paymentDate-ref
string.caption: Payment Date Reference
string.description: The date on which payment was made.

string.name: exchangeRateEffDate-ref
string.caption: Exchange Rate Eff Date Reference
string.description: The exchange rate effective date value.

enum.name: detailLevel
enum.caption: Detail Level
enum.description: Specifies the level of tax detail to return.

enum.name: docType
enum.caption: Doc Type
enum.description: The document type specifies the category of the document and affects how the document is treated after a tax calculation; see for more information about the specific document types.

enum.name: serviceMode
enum.caption: Service Mode
enum.description: This is only supported by AvaLocal servers. It provides the ability to controls whether tax is calculated locally or remotely when using an AvaLocal server. The default is Automatic which calculates locally unless remote is necessary for non-local addresses.

boolean.name: commit
boolean.caption: Commit
boolean.description: Commit flag. If Commit is set to true, tax for the transaction is saved, posted and committed as tax document.

element-controller-listOfMap.caption: Base Addresses
element-controller-listOfMap.description: Collection of physical addresses that will be referred to as the destination or origination of 1 or more invoice line entries.

element-controller-listOfMap.caption: Lines
element-controller-listOfMap.description: Collection of invoice lines requiring tax calculation.

element-controller-map.caption: Tax Override
element-controller-map.description: Indicates to apply tax override to the document.

enum.description: A code indicating the reason the document is getting canceled.

string.name: account
string.caption: Account
string.description: Registered Avalara account.

string.name: avalaraClient
string.caption: Avalara Client
string.description: Target client to which make the call.

password.name: license
password.caption: License
password.description: The matching license for the account.

string.name: companyCode
string.caption: Company Code
string.description: Client application company reference code. If docId is specified, this is not needed.

string.name: docCode
string.caption: Doc Code
string.description: The internal reference code used by the client application.

string.name: docId
string.caption: Doc Id
string.description: The original document's type, such as Sales Invoice or Purchase Invoice.

string.name: docDate-ref
string.caption: Doc Date Reference
string.description: The date on the invoice, purchase order, etc.

string.name: newDocCode
string.caption: New Doc Code
string.description: The new document code value.

string.name: totalAmount
string.caption: Total Amount
string.description: The total amount (not including tax) for the document. This is used for verification and reconciliation. This should be the TotalAmount returned by when tax was calculated for this document; otherwise the web service will return an error. The string represents a.

string.name: totalTax
string.caption: Total Tax
string.description: The total tax for the document. This is used for verification and reconciliation. This should be the TotalTax returned by when tax was calculated for this document; otherwise the web service will return an error. The string represents a.

enum.name: docType
enum.caption: Doc Type
enum.description: The document type specifies the category of the document and affects how the document is treated after a tax calculation; see for more information about the specific document types.

boolean.name: commit
boolean.caption: Commit
boolean.description: The commit value. This has been defaulted to false. If this has been set to true AvaTax will commit the document on this call. Seller's system who wants to Post and Commit the document on one call should use this flag.

string.name: account
string.caption: Account
string.description: Registered Avalara account.

string.name: avalaraClient
string.caption: Avalara Client
string.description: Target client to which make the call.

password.name: license
password.caption: License
password.description: The matching license for the account.

integer.name: companyId
integer.caption: Company Id
integer.description: The id of the company. (Need to be retrived from address bar in Avalara after hitting the Organization Tab).

string.name: batchName
string.caption: Batch Name
string.description: The name of the batch.

string.name: content
string.caption: Content
string.description: The content of this import, usually a csv file.

enum.name: batchType
enum.caption: Batch Type
enum.description: The kind of records to be imported.

string.name: account
string.caption: Account
string.description: Registered Avalara account.

string.name: avalaraClient
string.caption: Avalara Client
string.description: Target client to which make the call.

password.name: license
password.caption: License
password.description: The matching license for the account.

string.name: addressCode
string.caption: Address Code
string.description: The address code.

string.name: city
string.caption: City
string.description: City name. Required, when PostalCode is not specified.

string.name: country
string.caption: Country
string.description: Country code.

string.name: line1
string.caption: Line1
string.description: Address line 1.

string.name: line2
string.caption: Line2
string.description: Address line 2.

string.name: line3
string.caption: Line3
string.description: Address line 3.

string.name: postalCode
string.caption: Postal Code
string.description: Postal or ZIP code. Required, when City and Region are not specified.

string.name: region
string.caption: Region
string.description: State or region name. Requirad, when PostalCode is not specified.

enum.name: textCase
enum.caption: Text Case
enum.description: The casing to apply to the validated address(es).

boolean.name: coordinates
boolean.caption: Coordinates
boolean.description: True, if you want in the result a not empty latitud and longitude.

boolean.name: taxability
boolean.caption: Taxability
boolean.description: True, if you want the valid taxRegionId in the result.

string.description: Registered Avalara account.

string.name: avalaraClient
string.caption: Avalara Client
string.description: Target client to which make the call.

password.name: license
